content.title: Survey send!
content.creator:
Zjinnova
January 23, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
First and foremost, a massive THANK YOU for participating in this journey with us. We're thrilled to bring you important updates.
Check Your Inbox
You should have received by email a survey from the PledgeBox tool that recaps the details of your rewards and a form to confirm your delivery address. If you haven't seen it yet, please take a moment to check your spam or promotions folder. We need this information to ensure a smooth delivery of your KALOS K1 Pro.
Add-Ons Opportunity
If you want to add more KALOS K1 Pro, you can do so within the survey. This is a unique chance, and the prices won't be available after this opportunity.
There's something wrong with my pledge!
That's not impossible. If you notice something is awry, you can send us a message directly to kalosk1pro@outlook.com and we'll look at it for you.
What if I need to change my address?
As long as your items have not been locked, you can always change your address. Just simply log back into https://backer.pledgebox.com/user/login and make the appropriate change. However, if you change your country, additional shipping costs may apply.
Apple ID Backers:
Backers pledged with Apple ID but haven't fully set up their Apple Pay account (set up an email address to Apple Wallet) may not receive survey emails directly.
In this situation, you have two options:
Add a primary email to your Apple Pay account.
Use your Apple ID email to register a backer account on PledgeBox and complete surveys: https://backer.pledgebox.com.
Your prompt response is greatly appreciated. If you have any concerns or encounter difficulties, feel free to reach out to us.
Thank you for being a part of the ZJINNOVA journey!
Best regards,
ZJINNOVA Team

comments.text: hi, amy update on the shipment date? survey was already a while ago.

content.title: Thank you!
content.creator:
Zjinnova
January 8, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
We extend our heartfelt gratitude for your unwavering support throughout the KALOS K1 Pro campaign!
As we conclude this incredible journey, we are deeply thankful for your role in making it all possible. 
Over the next 14 days, we'll be reaching out with surveys to gather your addresses and confirm shipping details. Your active involvement has been pivotal, and we're eagerly anticipating the moment when we can deliver KALOS K1 Pro to each of you. 
Please stay tuned for further updates, and once again, thank you for being an integral part of this thrilling adventure!
Warm regards,
ZJINNOVA Team
